revision.text: Possibly: The Protestant system: containing discourses on the principal doctrines of natural and revealed religion. Compiled from the works of the following Protestant dissenters, viz. Abernethy, Amory, Baker, Benson ... In two volumes ... (London : Printed for R. Griffiths, 1758). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/316657186
